original_title: Heintje - Einmal wird die Sonne wieder scheinen
overview: When the bank clerk Klaus Helwig is arrested on suspicion of embezzlement, his son Heintje, whose mother died at birth, comes to his grumpy grandfather's house. Heintje manages to win his heart and prove his father's innocence..
title: Heintje - Einmal wird die Sonne wieder scheinen
